actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the General Services Administration to transfer the Old Post Office Building located in the District of Columbia to the National Endownment for the Arts.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the General Services Administration to transfer the Old Post Office Building located in the District of Columbia to the National Endowment for the Arts within one year.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the General Services Administration to transfer the Old Post Office Building located in the District of Columbia to the National Endownment for the Arts.
